column1: '''''karakse''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "jagged hedge of spikes".<ref name=Ety>{{LR

It has been suggested that a regularized spelling of ''karakse'' according to the style of Quenya used in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' would yield the form ''caraxë''.<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>
